job_purpose: To perform a variety of Estimating and Engineering tasks within a small team environment at Alloy Steel International.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Understand and interpret client enquiries to prepare proposals
Estimate, prepare, and submit email quotations
Assist in preparing subcontract & materials inquiries
Create quick sketches using software applications (AutoCAD)
Liaise with Engineering/Operations team for communication and teamwork
Identify material and time requirements by communicating with estimating and sales team
required_qualifications: Some experience in Drafting in a Manufacturing/Fabrication environment or a recent Engineering Graduate capable of reading drawings
Working knowledge/experience as a Junior Estimator highly desirable
Desire to work in the Manufacturing/Steel industry
Quick learner with attention to detail, able to work in a team and unsupervised
Sound computer skills and familiar with MS Office
company_details: Alloy Steel International is a leading WA based manufacturer of premium asset protection products and services with over 30 years of experience. Their purpose is to be the global leader in providing manufactured wear products and solutions to customers seeking high quality and reliable products.
